extendedInfo.description: While on vacation in the faraway land of Fairy Kingdom, Cuby and his friends meet the beautiful Cinderella, who runs an enchanted Cinderella Cafe for the princess. But business hasn't been going well for Cinderella, and it's only with the help of the kind-hearted bunch that her Cinderella Cafe can be saved!Help Cuby and his friends restore the legendary Cinderella Cafe to its former glory! Take on the challenge using your speed, skill, and quick thinking, and bring back what Cinderella Cafe was best known for â great food and fast, quality service!- VIP Day! Make more money by serving three beautiful princesses only on the VIP Day. It happens in every 30 days. Are you ready for the challenge in Cinderella Cafe? Cinderella Cafe Gameplay:You help Cuby and his friends serve all your customers quickly and efficiently. If your Cinderella Cafe does a great job, you will be rewarded with surprise. Donât let Cinderella down by helping her running Cinderella Cafe at your best! Cinderella Cafe Features:- Cute Pretty Pet characters- Challenging strategy gameplay- Upgrade Cinderella Cafe for faster service and greater satisfaction- Hire and level up your Cinderella Cafe assistantsA well known fairytale comes to life with Cinderella Cafe! Download Cinderella Cafe for FREE!Cinderella Cafe is by Animoca, a leading Android Mobile Social Game Developer. It's hit titles include Star Girl, Pretty Pet Salon, Pretty Pet Salon Season, Pretty Pet Tycoon, My Pet Cuby, Pretty Pet Toy Store, Pet Cafe, My Car Salon, Robo 5, Cinderella Cafe, Aqua City, Top Models, Stellar Escape, Forest Defense, Cover Beauty, Bulba the Cat, Diner City and many other cute and fun games and applications.

reviews.title: Wana points
reviews.comment: I ll give it 5 stars. Bt I m really disapointed. Coz I can\'t get pet points. I followed all the instructions wic it gv. Bt I can\'t get. if u hv points mean its great to play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t multiselect
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t multiselect tasks. I had to press each balloon numerous times in order for the task to be completed. Frustrating. Not worth the space or time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for the fix.
reviews.comment: Good game and the developers respond quickly to any issues. Since the update that fixed the last update, the game works great again. Thanks dev\'s. 5 stars. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pet point purchase
reviews.comment: I purchased pet points, love the game, but as someone else previously stated, it force closes all the time, but I know not to uninstall because I will loose everything. So be careful with pet point purchases...!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sfangg
reviews.comment: This is a fun game, but during a level you don\'t see your princess but her/his fairy. Later,in level 60 you don\'t get the yellow dish, which causes you to lose that customer.. After that my button to redeem free coins vanished, I\'ve gone 2 days without collecting. Please fix for 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blockbuster but...
reviews.comment: Think this game would\'ve been a blockbuster except u have to fc a lot when u get to higher levels, can\'t get pet points any other way, and it wouldn\'t even connect to get additional rewards. Uninstalled n reinstalled more than once, but same results each time. Uninstalling for good.
